Benchmark System Architecture

Modern benchmarking infrastructure with statistical rigor and comprehensive testing coverage.

  • Unified Infrastructure: Consolidated from fragmented benchmark files
  • Domain-Specific Tests: Transactions, TimeSeries, Streaming data patterns
  • Standardized Datasets: 7 realistic patterns (Basic, Mixed, Numeric, Wide, Deep, Unicode, Messy)
  • JSON Result Collection: Structured data for CI/CD integration
  • Statistical Rigor Framework: 95% confidence intervals, outlier detection, regression analysis
  • Engine Selection Testing: AdaptiveProfiler accuracy validation (target 85%)
